definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals

sentences.english: In 1979, the creation of wood" Bird Island".
Luxun had deep love for artistic works all his life, especially in woodcut of block print.
sentences.chinese: 魯迅先生一生熱愛美術作品，對版畫中木刻興趣尤甚。

sentences.english: Besides, the Taohuawu wood engraving Spring Festival pictures also enjoy great reputation.
sentences.chinese: 此外，桃花塢的木刻年畫也享有盛名。

sentences.english: Bold, handsome woodcuts reinforce the powerful drama depicted in poetry.
sentences.chinese: 大膽的，英俊的強大戲劇木刻加強在詩歌描繪。
他們正在創作一些木刻作品。

sentences.english: There're sculptures and woodblock prints in the exhibition.
The night was an etching in black and white.
sentences.chinese: 夜景猶如一幅黑白分明的木刻畫。

sentences.english: We are working on some wood-cuts.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在創作一些木刻。

sentences.english: There wasn't a camera, so you were reliant on likenesses from wood or steel engravings.
sentences.chinese: 那時沒有照相機，你只能依靠木刻或鋼雕的肖像。

sentences.english: Hakka people once played a positive role in the woodcut movement.
sentences.chinese: 就全國的木刻運動而言，客家人在諸多方面開了先河。

sentences.english: The oldest form of printmaking is the woodcut.
sentences.chinese: 最古老的版畫製作形式是木刻版畫。

sentences.english: The speaker Mr. Tong Siang Eng is a long-time researcher of woodcut art in Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 主講人董長英先生長期研究新加坡木刻版畫藝術。

sentences.english: BARBARA KLEIN: As you might have guessed, woodcut prints are made out of wood.
sentences.chinese: 你可能已經猜到了，木刻版畫是由木頭製成的。

sentences.english: In 868 the first printed book, using full page woodcuts, was produced.
sentences.chinese: 公元868年，第一本使用全頁木刻印刷的書問世。

sentences.english: Most of the woodblock prints of the Northeast are colored woodcuts.
sentences.chinese: 北大荒版畫基本上是套色木刻。

sentences.english: Xiangba is the transliteration of woodcut from Tibetan language.
sentences.chinese: “祥巴”，藏語音譯，意爲木刻版畫。

definition: papercutting (Chinese folk art)/to make paper cutouts
